alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 5:07AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 815 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 506 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over portions of Windward Oahu. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waikane, Kaaawa, Waiahole, Punaluu, Kahaluu, Hauula, Kahana Valley State Park and Kualoa. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 815 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
